item.description:

[code:: Results: client.java:16277: variable ItemID might not have been initialized if (ItemID == 2528) { ^ Note: Some input files use or override a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 1 error :: Done! Press any key to continue . . .

Ok and here is my CASE
